pages.title: Required Items
pages.text: The $(d)Blade of the Cursed Night$() must be acquired before any Soul Capturing can be performed. See weapons category for crafting info.

pages.title: Required Items
pages.text: A $(d)Soul Lantern$() must also be crafted before any Soul Capturing can be performed.

pages.title: Capturing Souls
pages.text: To begin capturing souls, simply hold the Blade of the Cursed Night in your main hand and the Soul Lantern in your offhand. Kill any mob, and you will be given a Soul Lantern with the mobs soul inside.

pages.title: Using Souls
pages.text: To use the Soul Lantern containing the $(d)Captured Soul$() inside, simply right click any candle with the lantern. This will light the candle with the contained soul. This is useful for applying Effects given by Candles to certain mobs.
